pr_title: Simplify BlockEncodingSerde by merging TypeSerde into BlockEncodingSerde

timeline.message:
Simplify BlockEncodingSerde

Merge TypeSerde into BlockEncodingSerde

Simplify BlockEncodingSerde

Merge TypeSerde into BlockEncodingSerde

timeline.bodyText: Why do we have HiveBlockEncodingSerde? What is it used for?
timeline.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText:
funny
// This class is exactly the same as BlockEncodingManager
public final class HiveBlockEncodingSerde

but the referenced class does not exist
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Seems to exist only for RecordingHiveMetastoreModule... I have no idea who added that, but it looks like @findepi was involved in the refactor that made it a top level class.
replies.author: dain

timeline.bodyText:
Preexisting, but it seems weird to decode type from the data stream, since type should be statically known.
Do we have plans to change this?
timeline.author: findepi
